DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether esophageal dysmotility and dilatation is an important complication in the long term follow-up following laparoscopic gastric banding for morbid obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Esophageal Dysmotility and Dilatation After Laparoscopic Gastric Banding
DOC.detailed_description: Using a yearly barium swallow the diameter of the esophagus will be monitored over the period.
